name: Zombie Rescue
description: Fight your way through a hungry horde of zombies, and defeat the zombie boss! You are equipped with two weapons. The Zombie Killer is a high-damage, no-nosense weapon that will make short work of the hungry foes. Use this weapon to get out of a pinch! The Zombie Converter does less damage than the Killer, but upon killing a Zombie with it, it will convert that zombie back into a human to join you in your fight! Use this weapon to convert Zombies and gather up an army to assist you. Although these allies don't hit as hard, they copy whichever gun you're using, and with enough of them, you can easily mow down swarms of Zombies.
